name: Exit, Consumed by a Bear
description:
Controls: Left and Right arrow keys to move. Space bar to grab.

CLICK ON THE WINDOW IF SPACEBAR JUST SCROLLS YOUR BROWSER SCREEN DOWN

Try to snag the actors when they approach the rear of the stage, but hurry! You only have until the end of the play in which to eat em all!

Follow on Twitter for more odd ideas: @FullRandomGames
